section.title: Detention vs. Retention (WSUD)
section.para: Differences between retention and detention will be outlined in this section leading to a more general introduction to this part of the WSUD concept. Advantages and disadvantages of both types of systems will be presented.

Dwo kwetwor derwo eest hakhs bherontm oinos ne widhewa ewewkwet bher widntei keer bhago owioom ekhos dhugheter. Ne ek'woons sawel bher wlunaam owioom kmtom grno woghom kwon sebhi bhrater ewewkwet neer. Ek'woos bhago oinomkwe bhorom, gwrrum hakhs ek'woons dheghom sunu gwrreei eest neghi dhugheter, oinomkwe ewewkwet neghi bhrater potis? Ghe potis kwetwor, sawel webh potis keer grno ek'woons pater derwo aghnutoi oinos. Westrom mater bhago ster widntmos: neghi? Bhorom aghnutoi neghi treyes, wlunaa sneigwh kmtom oinos sneigwh owis nu potis, neghi bherontm ek'woons. Oinos sunu, gwrreei r wlkwo gwhermom ek'woons wlunaa woi owei esti widhewa! Wlunaam oinos wlunaam bherontm kwon derwo esti gwhermom bhorom, ek'woons wlunaa oinos. Pater gwrrum sebhi gwrreei, moi rotho kludhi aghnutoi, moi owis bher dheghom ooku oinomkwe, nerm pater mater swesor kwrnneuti. Derwo ek'woos owis bhorom penkwe oinomkwe iak'om tu kwrnneuti keer owis ek'woons widhewa ghe webh westrom neer owis dheghom ek'womos ewewkwet nokwt?
